name: 梁曉帆
objective: 介紹人因工程的理論基礎與實際應用之方法與模型，透過課堂報告與討論以及專題實作，使學生熟悉並俱備解決相關問題之能力。
schedule:
Week 1-3: Research and design methods
Week 4-6: Human information processing
Week 7-8: Display/Control
Week 9: Mid-term Exam
Week 10-14: Work design
Week 15: 端午節
Week 16-17: Applications of Human Factors
Week 18: Final report and presentation
scorePolicy:
Mid-term Exam: 30%
Projects: 2x20% = 40%
Final report and presentation: 30%
Class participation: Extra 10%
materials: An Introduction to Human Factors Engineering (2nd. Eds., 2004) by Wickens et al., Prentice Hall (滄海)
